HISTORY.NO_SURVEYS: You haven't filled in any questionnaires yet

INTRO.TITLE: The Self-assessment tool
INTRO.DESCRIPTION: The tool is mostly tailor made for 55+ employees. It focuses on three areas technological proficiency, workplace integration skills, and well-being and job satisfaction. You can test it and find out your strong skills in each area. Each part is evaluated separately. You do not have to complete them all. You can choose what interests you or what is important to you.

WHO_WE_ARE.TITLE: Who we are
WHO_WE_ARE.DESCRIPTION_1: This self-assessment tool has been developed as part of the project "A practical approach to support the healthy adaptation and integration of workers aged 55+ into the labour market". The consortium of implementers includes representatives from the following countries Czech Republic, Slovenia, Hungary, Slovakia, Germany, Croatia, Serbia, Bulgaria, Bosnia and Herzegovina.

OUR_GOAL.TITLE: Our goal
OUR_GOAL.DESCRIPTION_1: The project aims to support the healthy integration of older workers (55+) into the labour market, to capitalise on their knowledge and to help them adapt to the challenges of new ways of working. The aim is to increase their participation, avoid early retirement and prolong their productive life.
OUR_GOAL.DESCRIPTION_2: The Self-assessment tool can be useful especially for individuals and their personal development planning, but also for companies (in terms of HR, diversity and inclusion strategies, and personalized development) and for policy makers.

TAKE_SURVEY.TITLE: Take the questionnaire
TAKE_SURVEY.DESCRIPTION: Explore your strengths and discover areas for improvement with our self-assessment tool tailored for those aged 55+. Participate now and take a step towards enhancing your career and personal development.

FILL_SURVEY.FILL_REGISTER_DESC: By registering, you gain full access to all the features of our self-assessment tool. Your results will be securely stored, allowing you to track your progress over time and compare your scores across different areas. Additionally, registration gives you the flexibility to save any incomplete questionnaires, so you can return to them later at your convenience.
FILL_SURVEY.FILL_WITHOUT_REGISTER_DESC: If you choose not to register, you can still fully engage with the self-assessment tool and view your results upon completion. However, please note that without registration, your results will not be saved, and you wonâ€™t be able to track your progress over time.

GDPR.TITLE: Information on the processing of personal data
GDPR.DESCRIPTION: We process and store your personal data in accordance with "Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC".

WHO_WE_ARE.TITLE: Who we are
WHO_WE_ARE.1: Univerzita Jana Evangelisty PurkynÄ› v ÃšstÃ­ nad Labem, established by Act No. 314/1991 Coll.

LIST_OF_PERSONAL_DATA.TITLE: List of processed and stored personal data
LIST_OF_PERSONAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION: We only process personal data that you provide to us.

PROCESSING.TITLE: Purposes of the processing of Personal Data
PROCESSING.DESCRIPTION: We process your personal data for the following purposes:
PROCESSING.1: for the retrospective identification of the users
PROCESSING.3: to send the results of the questionnaire and to verify the user's registration
PROCESSING.5: For research purposes (at the research stage, it will no longer be linked to a specific user - it will be used in an anonymized form)

LEGAL.TITLE: Legal basis for the processing of Personal Data
LEGAL.1: We process your personal data only on the basis of your consent.
LEGAL.2: You can withdraw your consent to the processing of your personal data at any time using the contact form in your user account.

TRANSFER.TITLE: Transfer of Personal Data to a third party
TRANSFER.1: We do not transfer your personal data to third parties. We only pass on anonymized data to third parties for research purposes.

STORING.TITLE: Personal Data storing and processing time
STORING.1: Your personal data will be processed for a maximum period of 1 year after your last login or until your consent is withdrawn.
STORING.2: In the event of a request for data erasure, personal data including the entire user history is deleted, however, anonymous data is retained for research purposes.

SECURITY.TITLE: Security measures
SECURITY.1: All communication between your device and our web servers is encrypted. Login credentials are hashed and all your data is stored only on servers in secure data centres with limited, carefully controlled and audited access.
SECURITY.2: For research purposes, all data is anonymized using a random key generated by the system. Reverse identification is not allowed. Researchers only have access to anonymized data.

PASSWORD.TITLE: Password security
PASSWORD.1: We do not have your passwords in the system, we do not store them in the database. We only work with specially calculated hash keys generated by a hashing function.

RIGHTS.TITLE: Rights related to the protection of personal data
RIGHTS.1: In relation to your personal data, you have in particular the right to withdraw your consent to the processing of your personal data at any time, the right to rectify or supplement your personal data, the right to request the restriction of its processing, the right to object to or complain about the processing of your personal data, the right to access your personal data, the right to request the transfer of your personal data, the right to be informed of a breach of security of your personal data and the right to erasure of the personal data that we process in relation to you (the so-called "right to be forgotten").
RIGHTS.2: You are in control of your personal data primarily through your user account. Here you can withdraw your consent to the processing of your personal data and amend, add or delete any information about you.
RIGHTS.3: Alternatively, you can contact us via the contact form in your user account to request an amendment, completion, restriction of processing or deletion of your personal data, to send us an overview of your personal data or to object to the processing of your personal data.
RIGHTS.4: If you believe that we are processing your personal data unlawfully, you also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Data Protection Authority. However, we will be happy if you address your complaint with us first. You can always contact us easily via the contact form found in your user account or via our Data Protection Officer, whose contact details can be found at the beginning of this document.
RIGHTS.5: We will process your request without undue delay, but within one month at most. In exceptional cases, in particular due to the complexity of your request, we are entitled to extend this period by a further two months. We will, of course, inform you of any such extension and the reasons for it.
